@graph.name: 4th of July Fruit Salad - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: This 4th of July fruit salad with watermelon, honeydew, cherries, and blueberries is not only patriotic but also easy to make, healthy, and so delicious!

@graph.name: 4th of July Fruit Salad
@graph.description: This 4th of July fruit salad with watermelon, honeydew, cherries, and blueberries is not only patriotic but also easy to make, healthy, and so delicious!

recipeInstructions.text: Cut both the watermelon and the honeydew into 1" slices. Then use a star-shaped cookie cutter to cut the melons into stars.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut both the watermelon and the honeydew into 1" slices. Then use a star-shaped cookie cutter to cut the melons into stars.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the strawberries and the cherries into half (leave some intact to put on top of the fruit salad).
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the strawberries and the cherries into half (leave some intact to put on top of the fruit salad).

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the melon stars, the strawberries, cherries, and blueberries in a large bowl and sprinkle with coconut flakes. If you want you could also serve this 4th of July fruit salad with some homemade coconut whipped cream.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the melon stars, the strawberries, cherries, and blueberries in a large bowl and sprinkle with coconut flakes. If you want you could also serve this 4th of July fruit salad with some homemade coconut whipped cream.
